Course Description: THIS COURSE PRESENTS ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES AND CONCEPTS APPLICABLE TO PURCHASES, SALES, INVENTORY, PREPAID EXPENSES AND OTHER BUSINESS TRANSACTIONS. ACCRUAL METHOD ACCOUNTING PROCEDURES ARE DISCUSSED WITH END-OF-YEAR PROCEDURES AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. ACCOUNTING SOFTWARE IS USED TO SET UP AN ENTIRE COMPANY, RECORD TRANSACTIONS, PREPARE ACCOUNTING REPORTS AND ANALYZE STATEMENTS.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
